description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by June 15, 2023 at 2:00 PM EDT. All bids submitted after 2:00 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number MM100-074622/B dated 2022-08-08 with a closing of 2022-09-07 at 2:00 p.m. (MDT). A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offereors/suppliers who bid on the previous solicitation. This NPP is issued pursuant to PWGSC Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C and covers a requirement from the following Product Category of the SA: - Product Category 1a – Interconnecting Panels - Product Category 2 – Freestanding Height Adjustable Desk/Table Products Public Services and Procurement Canada has a requirement for the purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture to Winnipeg, Manitoba by September 6, 2023.

full_summary:
**Supply and Installation of CAT 1 and CAT 2 Panels**
===============

**Procurement Notice**
-------------------

###  Reference Information

| **Element** | **Value** | **Description** |
| ------------- | --------- | -------- |

###  Contract Information

| **Element** | **Value** | **Description** |
|-------------|---------|--------------- |
| Contracting Entity Name (English) | Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) |  |
| Contracting Entity Name (French) | Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC) |  |
| Contracting Entity Address | 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada |  |
| Contact Person | Roxanne Kunz | roxanne.kunz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca |

###  Procurement Description

A competitive bid solicitation has been issued for the supply and installation of CAT 1 (interconnecting panels) and CAT 2 (height adjustable tables) panels to the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) in Winnipeg. Deliverables must be completed by 6 September 2023. The bid solicitation was amended to cancel and supersede a previous bid solicitation number MM100-074622/B dated 8 August 2022. Interested bidders may access the bid solicitation details on the Ariba Discovery platform or through the CanadaBuys website.
